name: The Summit (Archaic Empire Games)
description:
Game launched with the Prologue released!

An interactive fiction story in development. This is the first release. It is more text-based than image driven. Though it would be nice to develop it even further. :)

The Story:

Play as a journalism student and aspiring journalist. Meet new people, attempt to climb your way to the top, and uncover the truth ...or not.

Features:
  • Play as a male, female, or intersex/non-binary person.
  • Focus on improving your skills, talent, and relationships.
  • Figure out your direction in life and how to get there.

Credits:

Creator, writer, developer, editor, tester:

Nat Lee (Archaic Empire Games)

Base theme provided by:

Ingrid Elise (Out of the Blue)

Contact:

You can contact the creator via the blog (Archaic Empire Games).
